price: 252. Itulah ayat-ayat Allah, Kami bacakan kepadamu dengan benar dan engkau (Muhammad) adalah benar-benar seorang rasul.
arabic: تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱللَّهِ نَتۡلُوهَا عَلَيۡكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ وَإِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: til'ka āyātu al-lahi natlūhā ʿalayka bil-ḥaqi wa-innaka lamina al-mur'salīna
